word:
The seventy-six acres of hill and valley land is well cultivated, and will furnish much fruit and many vegetables for 
                                                                           13
the institution. Fifteen acres of the valley land is in alfalfa hay. Eight acres of the hill are in apricots, plums, and almonds. Ten acres are in good bearing orange orchard. Many acres of land round the cottages and the main building are laid out in lawns, drives, and walks.
